fields.Title: Data Retention Policy v3.2
fields.Body: All customer PII must be purged after 18 months (changed from 24). Exceptions require C-level approval.
fields.Author: jane.doe@contoso.com

fields.Title: Vendor Risk Assessment Framework
fields.Body: All third-party vendors handling sensitive data must complete annual SOC2 review.
fields.Author: bob.smith@contoso.com

fields.Title: Vendor SOC2 Audit — Acme Corp
fields.Body: SOC2 Type II audit received for Acme Corp. No material findings.
fields.Author: dave.wilson@contoso.com

fields.Title: Emergency Data Breach Response — Vendor X
fields.Body: Vendor X reported potential data exposure. Incident response team activated.
fields.Author: alice.chen@contoso.com
